level.heading: Fuel information ticket required for shipment or delivery of fuel into New York city.
level.text: ยง 24-176 Fuel information ticket required for shipment or delivery of fuel into New York city. No person, other than a dealer in solid fuel who complies with section 20-626 of the code, shall cause or permit the shipment or delivery of fuel into New York city for use in the city without first reporting the shipment or delivery on a form prescribed by the department to be known as a fuel information ticket. A fuel information ticket shall not be required for fuel shipped into New York city in the engine fuel tank of a motor vehicle. A shipment or delivery includes any sale or non-sale transaction, or any transaction between shipper and recipient who are identical.
